record.title: PERSONAL EXPLANATION
record.narrative:
PERSONAL EXPLANATION -- (House of Representatives - January 29, 2008)

[Page: H535]

speaking.paragraph: Madam Speaker, due to events scheduled in my district, I will miss votes on January 29, 2008. Please let the Record reflect that had I been present, my vote would have reflected the following:
H.R. 5140 Recovery Rebates and Economic Stimulus for the American People Act of 2008--"yea."
H.R. 1528 New England National Scenic Trail Designation Act--"aye."
H.R. 933 Commending the Louisiana State University Tigers Football Team--"yea."
